column4: can someone tell me if apt-get dist upgrade will be a smooth transition from edgy to feisty or feisty beta to feisty final because i heard feisty is coming out soon and want to know if i should wait a few weeks for it to come out before installing ubuntu back on this machine

it will when feisty goes final
